title: High School Degree
description: During my formative academic years, I attended Basic Education High School (BEHS) (2) Insein, where I completed my education from Grade 6 to Grade 11

title: Bachelor Degree of Myanmar Maritime University (Myanmar)
description: I pursued Marine Electrical and Electronics at Myanmar Maritime University, reaching the final year. Unfortunately, due to political unrest in my country, I was unable to obtain my degree.

title: Handong Global University (Korea)
description: I successfully completed the Operating System Course at Global Handong University, earning my first international certificate in the computing field.

title: NCC Level 4 Diploma in Computing (UK)
description: I recently achieved another diploma in the computing field by passing the NCC Level 4 Computing Diploma with flying colors.
